ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?
ygData.msgSnippet: I m working on Imbrued these days, my guildmates get a good laugh by calling me rainbow brite but they don t realize how much that hurts! ;-) Lambent BP
ygData.messageBody:
I'm working on Imbrued these days, my guildmates get a good laugh by calling
me "rainbow brite" but they don't realize how much that hurts! ;-)

Lambent BP
Imbrued arms
Imbrued legs
SS gloves
SS boots
hero bracer
Skull shaped barbute


so I'm blue, silver, green, and yellow...I actually ditched the Skull shaped
barbute in the name of fashion and refuse to wear headgear that has any kind
of graphic any longer, partially for RP reasons and partially for plain old
looks. I think a bard would not be able to sing very well with his head
stuck in a tin can.

we bards are so "flashy" lol

-Faras

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 10:11 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?


Talking of ugly, have you ever seen Iksar scale boots from Sebilis? They
are a pukie light green chain look. VERY ugly!

Rokenn
